## feedbackDelay variable

Extension of [Delay](./dsp.delay.md) which adds sum delayed value multiplied with `feedback` for each new input.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
feedbackDelay: (n: number, feedback?: number | undefined) => FeedbackDelay
```
